Rows.Name: Ashlands_Bunker_Note_1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Ashlands_Bunker_Note_1-Text", "The comms are shot, nothing in or out. The new guy who arrived yesterday is completely unstable. I caught him draining his canteen outside this morning. He said he doesn\'t need water out here. He\'s crazy, I\'m leaving this note in case something happens to us, I don\'t trust him.")

Rows.Name: Ashlands_Bunker_Note_2
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Ashlands_Bunker_Note_2-Text", "Brenda, this may never reach you back home but if it does please know that I love you. I fear for my life in this place. You were right, I never should have left Earth. Give my love to the children. Yours, Gerald.")

Rows.Name: Ashlands_Bunker_Note_3
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Ashlands_Bunker_Note_3-Text", "Screw the UDA, they don\'t pay me enough to deal with this crap. Note to self: negotiate higher fees for the next drop.")

Rows.Name: Icesheet_Outpost_Note_1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Icesheet_Outpost_Note_1-Text", "I\'ve never seen anything like it, huge, with big angry horns and hooves the size of a car. Norex\'ll be all over this later.")

Rows.Name: Icesheet_Outpost_Note_2
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Icesheet_Outpost_Note_2-Text", "We\'re down to three of us out here. Mike and Joe turned tail and left us but they won\'t last five minutes out there by themselves. It\'s only me and Jason now, I\'m pretty sure Hans is a lost cause. He has lost his mind, keeps talking about lights. Refuses to eat or drink anything. He\'s a goner.")

Rows.Name: Icesheet_Outpost_Note_3
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Icesheet_Outpost_Note_3-Text", "I found your nasty note about me, WILLIAM. Let\'s see how well you survive with a nice big hole in your suit, OR YOUR HEAD.")

Rows.Name: Icesheet_Cave_Note_1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Icesheet_Cave_Note_1-Text", "Jason D: Preliminary exploration has shown the presence of some sort of crystalline structure towards the rear of the cave. I\'ve urged the team to keep their distance as it seems to emit some kind of vibration, like a resonating frequency. Note: Hans appears to be deteriorating more each time he enters. Could be prudent to have him exit the sector and catch an evac pod out for evaluation.")

Rows.Name: Icesheet_Cave_Note_2
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Icesheet_Cave_Note_2-Text", "\"Hans has completely lost it. He\'s threatening to cave in the entrance to the tunnels. We\'ve been told to evac... Until we figure out what to do with him. Unfortunately, we have been using the cave as storage... All our food is there... I\'m not sure what\'s worse, being stuck outside to starve or being trapped in there with whatever\'s taken over his brain. I\'m scared.\"")

Rows.Name: Icesheet_Cave_Note_3
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "Icesheet_Cave_Note_3-Text", "Oh god, what have I become? The lights, they turned on me. They aren\'t beautiful at all, they burn and hurt and bleed. The cave is dark but it\'s also so BRIGHT. It hurts but I can\'t help myself, I have to get closer. I need it. The others don\'t understand, they hate me.")

Rows.Name: GH_RG_MiningCamp_1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_RG_MiningCamp_1-Text", "Buddy got too close to the drill today, we held a little ceremony and built him a little grave. He was the best cryogenically defrosted dog a man could hope for.")

Rows.Name: GH_RG_MiningCamp_2
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_RG_MiningCamp_2-Text", "We weren\'t paid... AGAIN! UDA thinks they can just expect us to keep working just because they have the only way off this rock. I\'m going to contact Sol, my crew needs to be paid.")

Rows.Name: GH_RG_MiningOutpost_1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_RG_MiningOutpost_1-Text", "Message from Site Alpha - WARNING - The Caveworms seem irritated, like something is occupying their tunnels - Report any strange behaviour to the UDA immediately.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_1-Text", "1.2.5 - Subjects appear to be tolerating the new apparatus, hopeful for expansion to other clinics in the next quarter.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_2
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_2-Text", "1.3.4 - Subjects have broken the current apparatus. Requesting reinforced equipment - estimated to arrive in approx 14 days.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_3
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_3-Text", "1.5.6 - Subjects have been observed dismantling the equipment for use as tools. Requesting reinforcement to the enclosure - estimated to arrive in approx 21 days.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_4
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_4-Text", "1.6.4 - Reinforcement still not delivered. Subjects have created a crack in the main panel. Evacuating junior staff as a precaution.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_5
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_LaboratoryNote_5-Text", "1.6.5 - Subject loose in the lab. Many casualties. Requesting personnel reinforcement immediately... It\'s... It\'s trying to release the others.")

Rows.Name: GH_IM_ResearcherNote_1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_IM_ResearcherNote_1-Text", "Something about the enzymes has been causing the surrounding ice and arctic matter to cling to the creatures.Terry wouldn\'t tell us where he got the vats from, he\'s always worked like that.I guess learning from Dr Lee would do that to anyone... He told me I\'d get fast tracked to IntSec if I joined his team. I should have known better, now I\'m going to die out here.")

Rows.Name: GH_IM_O1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_IM_O1-Text", "The enzyme-induced mutation weakens the creatures\' ability to withstand environmental stresses, particularly high heat. Controlled exposure to flame significantly disrupts their biology, suggesting fire as a potential method for neutralization.")

Rows.Name: GH_RG_MiningCamp_Log
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_RG_MiningCamp_Log-Text", "<Corrupted Data>")

Rows.Name: GH_IM_O1_StorageNote
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_IM_O1_StorageNote-Text", "Research Directive:\r\nEnzyme Experimentation & Enhancement\r\nStudy the effects of surplus terraforming enzymes on the introduced and evolved species in the Prometheus region. Investigate uses for human enhancement and potential weapon applications for THE COMPANY.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_OutpostNote_1
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_OutpostNote_1-Text", "1.1.24 - Captured subjects transported to new facility. I don\'t know why anyone would want to work in a desert.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_OutpostNote_2
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_OutpostNote_2-Text", "1.3.8 - Desert facility reported problems with their experiment. Too bad they wouldn\'t listen to me.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_OutpostNote_3
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_OutpostNote_3-Text", "1.5.12 - Received new enclosure materials today. Glad I can finally continue my research.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_OutpostNote_4
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_OutpostNote_4-Text", "1.5.16 - New test subject responding positively to local food, requires high quantities to satisfy.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_OutpostNote_5
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_OutpostNote_5-Text", "1.6.2 - I\'ve been ordered to assist the desert facility. I\'ve fed Fluffy, he\'ll be okay for a few days. I\'ll be back soon.")

Rows.Name: GH_IM_O1_Notice
Rows.Text:
NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_IM_O1_Notice-Text", "Attention
Researchers of Lab (LAB-12)

If you find yourself in trouble and can't make it back to the LAB-12, head to STR-X34.
It is located in a cave nearby and contains supplies, field equipment and backup data.
Use an ECHO Device.

- Senior Researcher Avery")

Rows.Name: GH_IM_B_Note
Rows.Text:
NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_IM_B_Note-Text", "Experimental 1:
Splicing Enzymes into Viscids
- Raw Aggression
- Rapid Deterioration
- Not Viable Test Subject

Experiment 2: 
Splicing Enzyme into Columbian Mammoth
- Increased Aggression
- Slow Deterioration
- Enzyme Decreased Core Temperature
- Not Viable Test Subject

(Scribbled at Bottom)
Woolly variety could possibly provide stable environment.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_O1_Note
Rows.Text:
NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_O1_Note-Text", "I refuse to leave my research in the hands of NOREX.

Screw the company, screw this job and screw the UDA while we're at it.

As soon as I've demolished this last section of dens, I am OUTTA HERE.

Man, I can't wait to eat a real steak again.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_C_Procedure_A
Rows.Text:
NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_C_Procedure_A-Text", "1. Gather A Sample - you need something to extract DNA from
2. Homogenize the Sample - this breaks open the cells to release the cell contents. 
3. Add Tris-EDTA - this helps to protect the DNA
4. Stir the Sample - This helps to dissolve the elements for uniform distribution
5. Heat the Sample - this helps with dissolution
6. Seperate the Solids and Liquids - This is easier for the next steps
7. Add Ethanol - this clumps the DNA together
8. Seperate the Solid from Liquids - this is so it can be easily examined
9. Examine with the Microscope to Confirm")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_C_Procedure_B
Rows.Text: NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_C_Procedure_B-Text", "Scalpels are sharp, and they can be found in the Surgical Equipment. Please be careful the UDA does not cover injuries to self while on planet.")

Rows.Name: GH_Ape_C_Procedure_C
Rows.Text:
NSLOCTEXT("D_CollectableNotes", "GH_Ape_C_Procedure_C-Text", "- Always clean up after yourself
- Store all equipment in the upper storage area next to the battery
- Repair the Turbines on the roof, there is a hammer in the nearby cupboard
- Always wash your hands when entering and leaving the lab
- Disposed of failed samples, burn them if you need to
- Watch out for Group 15 and Norex they will try and impersonate lab members 
- Have Fun (Safely)

(Handwritten) Watch for the Garganutan - they have setup Lairs nearby")
